thread.section_title: Sheenco Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sheenco Travel | sheencotravel.com
thread.title: Richard

author: Richard
title: Richard
text:
I found Sheenco on the wed. I was a bit leery working with them because of all negative stories you hear about the web. Anyway, I am very glad I took the chance. They are one of the best, if not the best tour group I have worked with. Everything they promised they delivered on and even more.
If you want a upstanding group to work with then I highly recommend them.
